data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Darhan-Uul, Mongolia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Darhan-Uul, Mongolia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Darhan-Uul, Mongolia, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 781 believers in Darhan-Uul to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Darhan-Uul who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Kalmyk-Oirat people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Darhan-Uul, Mongolia by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 781 believers in Darhan-Uul and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Darhan-Uul.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Darhan-Uul
location.people_groups_list: Kazakh, Durbet, Dorwoten, Dzakhchin, Zahchin, Uuld, Dariganga
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kazakh (116,000), Durbet, Dorwoten (83,000), Dzakhchin, Zahchin (38,000), Uuld (8,900), Dariganga (31,000)
